title: Ally Murphy | | djournal.com
text: Murphy Weather Alert ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING... ...HEAT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM CDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Excessive Heat Warning, dangerously hot conditions with heat index values up to 109 degrees. For the Heat Advisory, heat index values up to 107 degrees expected. * WHERE...Portions of North Mississippi and West Tennessee. * WHEN...For the Excessive Heat Warning, until 8 PM CDT this evening. For the Heat Advisory, from 9 PM this evening to 7 PM CDT Friday. * IMPACTS...Heat related illnesses increase significantly during extreme heat and high humidity events. PRECAUTIONARY/PREPAREDNESS ACTIONS... Drink plenty of fluids, stay in an air-conditioned room, stay out of the sun, and check up on relatives and neighbors. && ...EXCESSIVE HEAT WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM CDT THIS EVENING... ...HEAT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 9 PM THIS EVENING TO 7 PM CDT FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the Excessive Heat Warning, dangerously hot conditions with heat index values up to 109 degrees.
